ProjectTitle: InFormMe: Influencers’ (Mis-)Information on Social Media and Adolescents’ Political Engagement

3. Ethical Issues:
Did you also include ethical evaluation in your PRET application or only privacy registration? Note that ethical evaluation is recommended for all studies with human participants or their data, not only for experiments. Once you have final status on your PRET application please update the DMP. You can submit your updated DMP as intermediate but make update this in your final DMP that you submit to FWO at the end of your project. 
4. Documentation:
You can consider using a standard naming conventions for files and folders, for guidelines see:
www.ed.ac.uk/records-management/guidance/records/practical-guidance/naming-conventions
7. Sharing:
KU Leuven now also has a data repository (RDR) that you can use to share data: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
